content.rendered:
About me

Loredana started her journey in the higher education sector 8 years ago when she moved to the UK after completing a BA in Social Communication and Public Relations in Romania. Loredana joined Regent Group in October 2018 and within a year, in recognition of her hard work, she was entrusted with the vital responsibility of managing the HND Admissions department. She is working closely with the Professional Services team to develop new systems to support the delivery of admission services and contribute to the mission of Regent College London.

Key responsibilities

  • Provide appropriate leadership, guidance and support to the admission administrators
  • Produce accurate and timely quality data to support the development of the Admissions department
  • Ensure guidelines on qualification equivalencies are accurate and monitored to support admission processes
  • Work closely with colleagues from the Recruitment, Professional Services and Registry teams to enhance the conversion of applicants to enrolled students
  • Take leadership in projects relating to admission services as instructed by the Head of ARWA and Partnerships
